title: 10 की नोट जेब से गिरी, दैनिक जागरण ने 2000 और 500 के नोट पर थूक लगाकर सड़क पर फेंकने की ख़बर छापी
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
In Phillaur, Punjab, This Man Was Caught Throwing Notes On The Road After Spitting And Licking Them,

 A Security Guard Passing From There Saw This And Told Him To Pick Those Notes To Which He Refused So The Guard Called Police And Doctors.

 He Is Taken Into Custody
